description:
Ever since their champion was defeated, the world of girls' junior high ping pong has been in turmoil. Koyori is the new smirking transfer student at her junior high and she's ready to shake up girls' ping pong.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Table Tennis
tags.description: Centers around the sport of table tennis (also known as "ping pong").

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/132219566) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/IRICOMIX)

Affiliated with [Studio 3Hz](https://anilist.co/studio/6069/). One of the key members of JAniCA.

[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)

• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)

Founder of animation production studio [matlity](https://matlity-a.studio.site/), where she works as an animator, character designer and chief animation director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/132219566) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/IRICOMIX)

[Twitter 1](https://twitter.com/rio9u9) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/rio9u9vv) | [Website](https://rio9v9.punyu.jp/)

Founder of animation production studio [matlity](https://matlity-a.studio.site/), where she works as an animator, character designer and chief animation director.

__[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100003558003913)__

__Residency:__ Fujisawa, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kugenuma High School, Yoyogi Animation Academy

__Aiko Matsuyama__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter, who mainly does finishing.
